awards: **Abdullah Altair High School**: I got my high school diploma with a GPA of 88.4 in the basement where we lived. It was 16 feet' long by 1 feet wide. We were 6 of us and it was corona pandemic time.
**Started writing code at 17 years old**: The first programming language I learned was C#
**Until I was 15, I did  many manual labor jobs to support my family**: Restuarant, Labtop maintenance, delivery, Electrical extension worker, and more.
**I created a Telegram bot for the restaurant**: It helped customers find prices and branch locations, saving them time and hassle. Proud of this innovation and eager for more challenges ahead.
additionalExperience: **[The Software Engineer Showcaser](https://github.com/arabyalhomsi/the-software-engineer-showcaser)**: An open source resume application I used for this resume. I contributed by adding a skills section functionality.

highlights: A multidisciplinary research program that focused on programming, networking, and laptop and computer maintenance.
Selected courses: Data Structures And Algorithms, solid principles, Computer and laptop maintenance.
Eager to apply this knowledge to contribute effectively in a professional setting. I look forward to leveraging my skills in dynamic and challenging projects, driving positive change and growth.
Worked on the [Paymac](https://paymac.net/) company website, fixing issues, improving the design, and ensuring responsiveness across devices.

Contributed to the [Flove](https://flovegift.com/)Flove website and [App](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.flovegift.flove_client&hl=en_US), a Saudi platform for buying gifts like flowers and chocolates, focusing on the product section and refactoring JavaScript for improved functionality.

Worked on the [Refine](https://refine-care.com/) website and [App](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.paymac.refine_app&hl=en_US), adding a dropdown for 'Analysis Type,' enabling bulk updates, categorizing orders by status, implementing automatic cancellation of unpaid orders, and integrating map-based location capture for lab branches.

Worked on the [Vitamingy](https://vitamingy.com/en) ERP system, enabling clients to manage multiple addresses and select or add an address when placing a sale order. The system was developed using Livewire.
work.name: Paymac

highlights: Developed the [I Pluto](https://ipluto.app/) exam management feature on the Student Stage Online platform, enabling teachers to create exams by selecting questions and answers. Integrated front-end designs with the backend and implemented pages for managing exam units and details.

Contributed to the [Golden Host](https://goldenhost.co/) website and app, implementing features that prevent hosts from deleting apartments once rented and allowing users to rate apartments only once.
Worked on the [Golden Ticket](https://golden4tic.com/) website for buying and selling tickets, integrating a new front-end design with the backend and making modifications to enhance functionality.
work.name: Creative Minds

highlights: Built the [Arabian Horse](https://arabian-horse.topbusiness.io/) website using PHP Laravel, focused on Arabian horse care. Integrated the Filament package for efficient content management and streamlined admin processes.
Contributed to [SPA](https://spallia.com/), a Laravel-based platform for a major Cairo beauty center. Implemented CRUD operations, search, pagination, and efficient data querying. Created seed files.
Contributed to [Enviro Group](https://envirogroup.io/en), a waste recycling company, Developed a highly reliable laravel based dashboard, with full CRUD for all data models.
Played an integral role in the advancement of the [Solar Vally](https://solarvalleypv.com/en) project, highlighting remarkable programming proficiency through the conception of a dynamic dashboard.

Developed [Makasip](https://makasip.com/) enhancements: dynamic points system (10-50 points with inactivity resets) and referral links (10 points for new user registrations), boosting engagement and acquisition.

Contributed to [Mamdouh portfolio](https://portfolio.motaweron.com/), a dynamic site for showcasing expertise in trading and real estate. Used PHP and Laravel to design a user-friendly platform with property listings

Oversaw product inventory and collaborated with restaurant and cafe representatives, optimizing supply chain management for enhanced efficiency and [Loyalty](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.topbusiness.walaaprovider)
Designed and executed a project for a remote physics professor, enabling student education through the creation, response, and interaction with instructional videos.
Contributed to a Laravel-based [university](https://faculty.topbusiness.io/) management system. Strengthened technical expertise and teamwork skills.
